nodes.text: The 4th Wing Guard was a cloud car squadron assigned to the Bespin Wing Guard—a security force working to protect Cloud City from the Imperial Remnant.

Around 12 ABY, the 4th Wing Guard fought back against the corruption growing among the security forces of the New Republic. When Jedi Master Luke Skywalker and Jedi Knight Kyle Katarn traveled to Bespin, they found Cloud City an open battleground between its natives and Imperial Remnant forces. A successor to the 3rd Wing Guard, the 4th Wing Guard assisted the Jedi in liberating Cloud City.

Based in Cloud City Security Tower on Bespin's Cloud City, the 4th Wing Guard's cloud cars were painted orange and offered moderate protection to the pilots who flew them at the expense of targeting accuracy.
The 4th Wing Guard was represented by a miniature in the Scum & Villainy expansion of the Star Wars PocketModel TCG.
